nodes.excerpt: Neverlose.money is the first-ever gamified DeFi protocol that pays a bonus to long-term investors, known as HODLers, using the penalty charge paid by users who fail to HODL.
nodes.title: Neverlose.money - A DeFi protocol that lets you invest crypto like Mr. Buffett
nodes.author: Younghwi Cho

localize.description: Neverlose.Money是有史以来第一个游戏化的Defi协议，它向被称为HODLers的长期投资者支付奖金，使用未能Hodl的用户支付的惩罚性费用。
localize.tagline: 一种Defi协议，让你像巴菲特先生一样投资密码

localize.description: Neverlose.Money是有史以來第一個遊戲化的Defi協議，它向被稱爲HODLers的長期投資者支付獎金，使用未能Hodl的用戶支付的懲罰性費用。
localize.tagline: 一種Defi協議，讓你像巴菲特先生一樣投資密碼

nodes.excerpt: Baaz enables live video commerce for retailers globally. A retail store can host live videos, manage catalogs, live chats, payments, shipping, promotions and influencers from Baaz app. All things related to live video shopping in one place.

localize.description: Baaz为全球零售商提供现场视频商务服务。零售店可以托管实时视频，管理目录，实时聊天，支付，送货，促销和Baaz应用程序的影响力。所有与视频直播购物相关的东西都集中在一个地方。

nodes.excerpt: Learn Azure Fundamentals is an app which helps you to learn the basics of Microsoft Azure and Cloud Computing by answering questions in tests. App contains 14 unique tests, 269 questions, 132 articles. Learn offline. App is absolutely free. No Ads.

nodes.excerpt: Invoicer is a document based invoice maker app available exclusively on iOS/iPadOS/macOS platforms. All your invoice files and preferences are stored in iCloud so you can work seemlessly across different devices without the need to create an account for syncing.

nodes.excerpt: Daily-curated Remote Jobs for Everyone Features: - simple list (Hacker News style) - simple & fast search powered by Algolia - only the latest jobs from the last 30 days - no long descriptions, just simple titles and links - no ads - simple email newsletter

nodes.excerpt: Privacy policies and data request forms SHOULD be easy to find, but many companies hide them deep in their UI. Privacy hunt is a simple, free, crowd-sourced repository to reduce that to 1 click! 😁 Find a company, click on the link, and reclaim YOUR data. 🙌
nodes.title: Privacy Hunt - We hunt data request forms, so you can reclaim YOUR data.
nodes.author: Robert Thelen

localize.description: 隐私政策和数据请求表应该很容易找到，但许多公司将它们隐藏在用户界面的深处。Privacy Hunt是一个简单、免费、众包的存储库，只需单击一次即可！😁找到一家公司，单击链接，然后回收您的数据。🙌
localize.tagline: 我们寻找数据请求表，这样您就可以回收您的数据。

localize.description: 隱私政策和數據請求表應該很容易找到，但許多公司將它們隱藏在用戶界面的深處。Privacy Hunt是一個簡單、免費、衆包的存儲庫，只需單擊一次即可！😁找到一家公司，單擊鏈接，然後回收您的數據。🙌
localize.tagline: 我們尋找數據請求表，這樣您就可以回收您的數據。

localize.tagline: 一体式人员参与平台

localize.description: 在文化上賦予您的員工更好的文化，以提高績效和促進組織發展。它還使用🎯OKR、🎭1：1會議和其他同類最佳工具將經理和員工聚集在一起。
localize.tagline: 一體式人員參與平臺

nodes.excerpt: Help your friends get a job by embedding a widget on your website where you point visitors to your friends for jobs that you're not available for. Create your widget in the online generator and embed it on your website using an iframe. It's as simple as that.
nodes.title: Referrer - Painlessly refer your friends for jobs
nodes.author: Albin Groen

localize.description: 通过在你的网站上嵌入一个小工具来帮助你的朋友找到一份工作，在那里你可以把访问者引导到你的朋友那里，寻找你找不到的工作。在在线生成器中创建您的小部件，并使用IFRAME将其嵌入到您的网站上。就这么简单。
localize.tagline: 毫不费力地推荐你的朋友找工作

localize.description: 通過在你的網站上嵌入一個小工具來幫助你的朋友找到一份工作，在那裏你可以把訪問者引導到你的朋友那裏，尋找你找不到的工作。在在線生成器中創建您的小部件，並使用IFRAME將其嵌入到您的網站上。就這麼簡單。
localize.tagline: 毫不費力地推薦你的朋友找工作

nodes.excerpt: Derived from the concept of planet rotation and all things of cosmos, The X Planet, an exquisite car freshener, is ingeniously designed in the shape of a planet.
nodes.title: X Planet - The Most Novel Car Freshener You Need
nodes.author: Liso

localize.description: 源自行星自转和宇宙万物的概念，X星球这款精致的汽车清新剂，巧妙地设计成行星的形状。
localize.tagline: 你需要的最新奇的汽车清新剂

localize.description: 源自行星自轉和宇宙萬物的概念，X星球這款精緻的汽車清新劑，巧妙地設計成行星的形狀。
localize.tagline: 你需要的最新奇的汽車清新劑

nodes.excerpt: Hacker News Front Page Explorer is a database of Ranked Hacker News Front Page posts. Some Example Use Cases:- - find ways to rank your post on the Front Page - discover top trends in HN Community. - build an App using this data
nodes.title: Hacker News Front Page Explorer - A database of top ranking Hacker News front page posts
nodes.author: Harish Garg

localize.description: 黑客新闻头版资源管理器是一个排名的黑客新闻头版帖子的数据库。一些示例用例：--找到在首页对您的帖子进行排名的方法--发现HN社区的热门趋势。-使用此数据构建应用程序
localize.tagline: 排名靠前的黑客新闻头版帖子数据库
